response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This remarkable item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features, craftsmanship, and the investment we've made into its development. Given its worth to you at $1,000,000, I believe this is an opportunity for mutual benefit. I kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession.", "product_price": 1150000}
